CLUE: Regions at the top and bottom of the world
FOUND IN: Poles (Polar Regions) - Areas surrounding the Earth's geographic poles; include both Arctic (North Pole) and Antarctic (South Pole) regions.
Reemerge - to come back into view or prominence after being hidden or forgotten.

Analogous - Similar in certain respects; comparable.
Titanium (Ti) - An element with atomic number 22 known for creating strong and corrosion-resistant alloys, commonly used in aerospace applications due to its high strength-to-weight ratio.
Circus Maximus - An enormous stadium for chariot racing, located in ancient Rome and considered one of the largest Roman hippodromes.
